role.argrole: thing has a lack of something

example.parse: (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC واصفة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-OBJ (PRT (PART ايا)) (PRON_3MS ه)) (PP (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS ه)) (ADJP-PRD (PUNC ") (ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM عديم) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الفائدة)) (PUNC ")))
